s1.ptxt: Remove OCV. OCV Removal and Installation:N32A
If faulty condition is found, replace OCV.

item.ptxt: Check that surface of strainer part (1) is not clog get and free from foreign material.
Check that surface of OCV is free from damage.

s1.ptxt: If faulty condition is found, replace OCV.

s2.ptxt: Measure resistance between terminals. If resistance is within specification, go to step b).
Connect 12 V battery to terminals, and then confirm actuation of spool (1).

item.ptxt: Do not apply voltage to OCV for 5 sec. or more. Otherwise, coil of OCV will be damaged.
To avoid over-current caused by short circuit in OCV, use circuit fuse (2) into circuit between battery positive terminal and OCV terminal.
